title: Killer on the Key
description: Whisked away to tropical Gulf Key to recover from tragedy, Maggie Shoals stumbles into the curse of the Ashland family where the women maintain control over the Ashland fortune and the men die of mysterious causes.Spencer Ashland, the last living male heir, quickly sets his sights on Maggie; and what Spencer Asland wants, Spencer Ashland gets. Torn between saving her crumbling marriage and starting over in paradise, Maggie soon realizes that things arenâ€™t always what they appear; especially when they come with secrets so deep no one dared to dig them up...until now.
author: E.B. Loan
